title: बिहार के बाढ़ से असंबंधित है मृत पड़े बच्चे की वायरल तस्वीर
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Muzaffarpur DM on viral image of drowned infant washed ashore: Reena Devi,resident of Shitalpatti village, after fight with husband pushed her 4 children into river & herself jumped into river on July16. Woman along with 7-yr-old daughter survived. 3 of her children died #Biharpic.twitter.com/WkzzUfjWMR
